ATELIER

Les metiers d'Art

Together under one house, our metiers exquisitely craft each piece to it's highest potential, the ultimate journey of beauty. Our team's expert craftsmen cut, drape, sew, draw, sketch, pin, measure, tape, embroider generations of the finest expertise, weaving it togther with life, love and play, ready for you enrobe yourself in the creation and feel it all.

Where the idea flow...

- Metier Du Design -

Where the formless becomes form...

Itching to stitch!

Where the thread comes alive...

EMBROIDERY

- METIER A BRODER -

Exquisite embrace!

Where it all comes together...

FINISHING

Altention to detail!

When the wow sets in...

PERFECTION

- METIER D'EXPERTISE -

The final touch!

L'ATELIER LONDON

Our Atelier in Chelsea Creek is a secret place, the perfect inspiring space to come and explore, play, and create art together.

Private and discreet, strategically situated very close to London Heliport and Chelsea Harbour for clients arriving by air or boat.
